Here are some expressions you can use when giving bad news.
I'm afraid to inform you that...
Please don't take this the wrong way... but...
I'm sorry I have to tell you this, but...
I've got some bad news, I'm afraid.
I need to warn you, I have some bad news.
There is no easy way to say this but...
I regret to inform you that...
I am sorry to have to tell you this, but...
I'm afraid I've got something sad to tell you...
